text: Masaharu Fukuyama is a Japanese singer and movie and television actor. He is from Nagasaki, Kyūshū. One of his most well-known songs is "Sakurazaka". ==References== ==Other websites== *Fukuyama Masaharu Official web site * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese singers Category:People from Nagasaki Prefecture
title: Masaharu Fukuyama
